scripts.build:amd64: cross-env GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64 go build -o replacciato-linux-amd64 main.go
scripts.build:windows:amd64: cross-env GOOS=windows GOARCH=amd64 go build -o replacciato-windows-amd64-cli main.go
scripts.build:macos:amd64: cross-env GOOS=darwin GOARCH=amd64 go build -o replacciato-macos-amd64-cli main.go
scripts.build:arm: cross-env GOOS=linux GOARCH=aarch64 go build -o replacciato-linux-aarch64 main.go
scripts.build:windows:arm: cross-env GOOS=windows GOARCH=aarch64 go build -o replacciato-windows-aarch64-cli main.go
scripts.build:macos:arm: cross-env GOOS=darwin GOARCH=aarch64 go build -o replacciato-macos-aarch64-cli main.go
